text: Titas Bhowmik is an Indian actress who is known for playing the role of Kakoli in the Bengali television serial Tomay Amay Mile, and in the 2011 film Paglu,. To commemorate Shakespeare's birthday, she participated in an event where she performed a scene from Taming of the Shrew in Kolkata. Bhowmik was married to the film actor Samadarshi Dutta.(M: 2014-2018). In 2013 she participated in the most controversial popular reality show Bigg Boss Bangla 13. ==Television== *Ghore Pherar Gaan *Tomay Amay Mile *Dugga Dugga *Sannyasi Raja *Mahaprabhu Shree Chaitanya *Joy Baba Lokenath *Meera *Bigg Boss Bangla *Kora Pakhi ==Film== *Kadambari 2015 *Paglu 2011 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Indian film actresses Category:Indian television actresses Category:Actresses from Kolkata Category:Living people Category:Actresses in Bengali cinema Category:Bengali television actresses Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Titas Bhowmik
